profile: TorontoGranite.com is your one-stop shop for luxury stone surface applications featuring granite, Caesarstone and Silestone quartz, marble, and glass materials to suit all of your needs. We are a direct importer and a full service company providing unique and individual stone and glass applications for residential and commercial settings.
products: We specialize in kitchen granite, quartz, marble and glass countertops, bathroom vanity tops, custom fireplace surrounds, floor inlays, wall coverings, tub surrounds, tables and other natural stone applications.
services:
We also offer professional waterjet cutting, polishing, and installation of prefabricated and custom granite countertops. We can also waterjet cut the granite to the exact dimensions of your home so you can install it yourself. 

TorontoGranite.com can facilitate all of your natural stone needs. We can create everything from custom countertops and vanities to fireplace surrounds, to custom floor inlays. Whatever your imagination can conceive, we can create. 

Please contact us today for a free estimate.

profile:
Timeless in style, dependable in performance and exceptional in design, look to Rockstella Stonery to craft the perfect granite, marble or quartz countertop for your home or office. A natural option for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities and tub surrounds, these materials are also excellent alternatives for fireplaces, bar tops, reception desks and more. We handle all aspects of design, fabrication and installation, and are always prepared to take on a variety of projects, from single vanities to full-scale home installs to multi-unit projects.

***

We distinguish the caliber of our work at Rockstella not just through outstanding craftsmanship and affordable pricing, but more importantly, through an unparalleled level of service. We’ve earned a reputation for being timely, approachable and efficient, and we always plan our consults and installs at a time that suits your schedule – whether it’s business hours, weekends or after hours. It also bears pointing out that we work directly with you – there are no sub-contractors involved – from on-site measuring to individual slab selection to professional installation.

***

At Rockstella Stonery, we like to refer to the unique style and design of our stone options as affordable luxury – an option that will stand out in your home or place of work and that will endure for ages. We’re based in Stoney Creek, and are ready to provide our services to clients throughout Hamilton, Niagara region and GTA.
service_area: With showroom in Mississauga we serve entire GTA.

profile:
Techno Kitchen Refacing is an Ontario based kitchen renovation company that specializes in refacing, rather than replacing. Recently, we brought on another member to the team to supply the increasing demand. Now, we can serve you faster, and across a larger area.

Techno's word-of-mouth marketing philosophy shows how happy customers have been with the product. Honesty and customer satisfaction are of the utmost concern for Techno and the customer will benefit every time.

Want to see it for yourself? Our customers are so happy and enthusiastic about the work that they've allowed us to invite you into their homes to see firsthand the quality of the work. Call today and ask how to arrange a meeting with Frank.
service_area: Stoney Creek, Hamilton, Grimsby, St. Catherine's, Niagara, Welland, Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Georgetown, Halton Hills, Caledon, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Markham, Ajax, Pickering, Richmond Hill, Oshawa, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Barrie, Muskoka, Kitchener, Cambridge, Waterloo, Guelph, Ayr, Orangeville, Flamborough, Waterdown
hours: Tuesday to Friday 10 am - 5 pm Saturday 10 am - 4 pm
products:
Why Choose Techno?
Full Satisfaction Guarantee! Real wood doors and veneer in several different stains, colors and species! No plastic, no paper, no cheap looking laminate! We're a member of the Better Business Bureau! You work directly with the owner who will be personally involved in making your dream kitchen a reality!
services: Cabinet repainting, cabinet refacing and custom-built cabinetry and entertainment units.
specialities:
*WE SPECIALIZE IN REAL WOOD*
After 15 years of experience in the woodworking and cabinetry industry, Techno founder Frank Silletti chose to start his own refacing company with the goal of giving homeowners in Ontario a more affordable alternative to traditional kitchen remodeling. Frank says "By using the cabinet refacing process, we are able to dramatically cut down the time, cost and inconvenience of building and creating your dream kitchen". With the experience and the motivation to back his work, you can be sure Frank will be there to answer any questions or concerns to deliver the best value and quality of work available. Please feel free to visit the contact page and fill out an information request form. We look forward to hearing from you!
name: Techno Kitchen Refacing

profile:
From the year 1989 Brampton Kitchen & Cabinets Ltd. has been designing and manufacturing Custom Cabinetry, with Custom Kitchens being its flagship service. Brampton Kitchen follows a set of ethical values and professional procedures. We operate with the highest level of integrity and rigidly adhere to the policy of customer service, accountability and skill. We are a credible organization that stands behind its product. 
Extensive experience of several years and expertise of best artisans and craftsmen, we create designs that stand out. Be it your Kitchen, Bathroom, Vanity, Entertainment Unit, Bar or Walk-in Closet we have the skills to meet your every need. Our thorough knowledge of our trade is our biggest asset. We learn about your lifestyle while working alongside with you, so as to tailor your kitchen or cabinetry according to your specifications. From Planning to Designing to Manufacturing, we make sure you love every step along the way. We educate you about the industry, current trends and styles so that you make an informed decision.  We can turn your dream into reality without having to compromise on budget or quality.

profile:
Latitude Countertops is known for producing excellent quality Natural and Engineered Stone Countertops. Our commitment to provide top notch service has made us the largest fabricator of granite & quartz counter tops in the Toronto area.  Latitude fabricates  natural stone such as Granite and Marble from reputable suppliers. You don't need to worry about the quality of your stone, we only deal with the best. 
We work with all the leading Quartz companies such as  Caesarstone, Silestone, LG Viatera, Hanstone, Compac, and Diamastone. We will also fabricate acrylics such as Corian, Hi Macs and Staron.  
Customers can purchase their Kitchen countertops & Bathroom vanities directly or through our vast dealer network. We work with dealers all over Southern and Northeastern Ontario. To find a dealer near you check our website, as well for remnants and special offers visit our website www.latitudecountertops.com and view our blog at blog.latitudeonline.ca 
We meet the needs of our Builders, renovators and Home owners throughout Ontario.

To find a dealer close to you please visit our website.
service_area: Ontario;  G.T.A., Northern Ontario, Eastern Ontario, Southern Ontario, Western Ontario, Ajax, Whitby, Peterborough, Kawarthas, Peel, York, Courtice, Durham, Peterborough, Cobourg, Port Hope, Oakville, Burlington, Mississauga, Kingston, Trenton, Belleville, Napanee, Midland, Owen Sound, Wiarton, Orillia, Barrie, Innisfill, Alliston, Milton, Georgetown, Orangeville, Shellburne,
products:
Kitchen countertops and bathroom vanity countertops and shower and tub surrounds in Natural Stone such as Granite, Marble, Quartz such as Caesarstone Quartz, LG Vitera Quartz, Silestone Quartz, Hanstone Quartz, Compac Quartz, DuPont Zodiaq, DuPont Corian, Samsung Staron, Blanco Premium Sinks and Faucets.
We also do Laundry Room countertops, Entertainment Center countertops and bars, tub surrounds, fireplace walls and Hearths.
Tables and many other Natural and Engineered stone applications.
services: Latitude works on a Guaranteed 8 -10business day turnaround from countertop template to installation.  We digitally template all Kitchen and Bathroom countertops and can do so without removing your exiting countertop.  We also provide a countertop removal and or disposal service if you need to have your existing countertop removed before the new one is installed.  Our template process will take from 30min to 1.5hours.  Following the template, we will fabricate your custom countertop and return to install it within 10 business days, guaranteed.  Installations can take from 1 to 4 hours depending on the size of the project.   We also alter existing natural stone and acrylic countertops to fit new appliances.
brands: Caesarstone Quartz, Hanstone Quartz, Compac Quartz, LG Viatera Quartz, Silestone Quartz, DuPont Zodiaq, DuPont Corian, Samsung Staron, Blanco Premium Sinks and Faucets and Elegant Stainless Steel Sinks.
specialities:
!!!!  NEW IN JUNE 2014, Latitude now offers Granite and Quarzite Countertops with a 25 Year Stain Proof Warranty !!!!
We also have 5 colours of granite on promotion, available at $38.00 per square foot. Please contact us for more information.
Check out our remnants in our showroom, a vast selection of quartz, granite and marble.

profile:
QUALITY. CUSTOMIZATION. STELLAR CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Aras Marble Inc. brings over 20 years of marble design and fabrication experience right to your home. We have the resources and passion to create the marble, granite, porcelain and quartz project of your needs, with high quality and unmatched customer service throughout the entire journey.
We are Toronto's Leading Countertop Installation and Fabrication Company. Aras Marble Inc. provides top of the line fabrication and installation of commercial and residential countertops for private and commercial customers. With over 20 years of experience and a real focus on customer satisfaction, you can rely on Aras Marble Inc. for your next renovation or new project.

Our specialty is custom fabrication and installation of indoor and outdoor countertops. Whether you need to install kitchen countertops, vanities, fireplaces, or shower jams, we do it all. We specialize in all types of natural stone including Granite, Quartz, Marble, Quartzite, Limestone, Travertine, Slate, Onyx and Soapstone.

Our Mission is to make our client’s visions become reality and exceed expectations in terms of quality, cost, time management, and commitment. Our Vision is to consistently provide our customers with high quality and stunningly designed marble projects.
.

Anything you want, you name it!

profile:
Sinterstone Canada offers a wide variety of high end porcelain slabs (known as sintered stone worldwide). Our showroom is the largest in the GTA and our product is of the highest quality, for a great price. We offer fabrication as well as installation. 

This material is known for being very hard to damage, it is non-toxic, and it has the look/feel of natural stone such as marble for a fraction of the price. Zero maintenance and very long lasting.

profile:
Rosewood Kitchens is a family owned custom cabinetry company, specializing in creating custom kitchen cabinets, washroom vanities, office cabinets, islands, and bars. With a passion for re-modelling spaces, Rosewood Kitchens is committed to creating beautiful spaces for your home and office using only the best quality materials and skilled craftsmanship. Having over 25 years of carpentry experience, we incorporate the use of the latest technologies and hardware, along with rich woods and textures to create a unique space that fits each client’s needs.

Are You Ready To Make Your Dream Kitchen A Reality? Well, Look No Further! Here At Rosewood Kitchens, Fine Cabinetry Is Revealed As You Look Beyond The Exterior Beauty And Into Its Components, Construction, And Finishing. Every Rosewood Kitchen Cabinet Is Made To Order By Our Skilled Team Members, Whose Focus Is On Crafting Quality Pieces, One Detail At A Time. We Invite You To Explore What Rosewood Kitchens Has To Offer!

profile:
Established in 2015, we are a fast growing, full service, detail-oriented custom cabinetry company trusted by customers in the Greater Toronto Area.

Fantasy Kitchen specializes in offering top-quality custom kitchen cabinets in Markham. We are passionate about enhancing the beauty and functionality of your home. As the most trusted cabinet manufacturer in GTA, we craft and install custom bathroom vanities in Richmond Hill.

Our goal is to exceed your expectations on every project, regardless of size. We have a team of skilled craftsmen for designing and installing custom wall units in Markham. Whether you need custom kitchen cabinets, bathroom vanity, walk-in closet, or home bar, we can customize cabinetry to suit your taste, style, and budget. Our team can also install custom wall units in Richmond Hill homes and commercial spaces. As a full-service cabinetry installer, we can make your home more stylish, comfortable, and spacious.

When it comes to kitchen cabinets and bathroom vanities, you need products that can withstand temperature fluctuations due to heat from stoves and ovens and moisture from showers, sinks, and dishwashers.

We focus on using the highest quality material and durable fixtures that can stand the test of time. Our process involves taking accurate measurements and understanding your vision to deliver tailored solutions. When we install custom bathroom vanities in Vaughan, we make sure to provide you a product that complements the size and style of your space.

We strive to turn your bathroom into a sanctuary. When we work on any project, our designers consider aesthetics, as well as functionality. Our experts will not only help you choose the right cabinetry material but can also guide you to select the best hardware and finishes that look phenomenal and can stand up to the challenges of a bathroom or kitchen environment. Our services include:

• Kitchen & Bathroom Design Consultation
• Custom Cabinets Manufacturer
• Kitchen Cabinetry Installation
• Bathroom Vanity Installation
• Walk-In Closet Installation
• Home Bar & Pantry
• And More!

At Fantasy Kitchen, we take great pride in our workmanship. From crafting custom Kitchen cabinets in Markham to installing bathroom vanities in Richmond Hill, we provide a wide range of superior quality products and spectacular installation services for almost every budget and style. We always respect your time and consider your ideas to ensure that the project is completed as per your requirements and expectations. We provide you the freedom to choose from our wide assortment of premium materials. In addition to this, we always provide accurate project quote to keep you informed. The cabinets we install provide a great storage solution to provide you an organized and attractive-looking space.
name: Fantasy Kitchens
